holidays.title: National Shower with a Friend Day
holidays.description: Tired of the polar vortex? Heat things up on National Shower with a Friend Day.

holidays.title: National Signing Day
holidays.description: Today, high school football players are eligible to commit to the college of their choice.

holidays.title: National Weatherperson's Day
holidays.description: We honor individuals in the fields of meteorology, weather forecasting and broadcast meteorology.

holidays.title: World Nutella Day
holidays.description: Arguably among the most indulgent holidays, World Nutella Day is here for your eating pleasure.

holidays.title: Adlai Stevenson Day
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate the life of one of America’s greatest politicians.

holidays.title: Disaster Day
holidays.description: Come and join us as we learn more about Disaster Day together.

holidays.title: Feast of St Agatha
holidays.description: Today, honor the patron saint and beacon of hope for survivors everywhere.

holidays.title: Global School Play Day
holidays.description: Today is the day to let the children run around as much as they want.

holidays.title: International Clash Day
holidays.description: Is it surprising that “The Only Band That Matters” has an entire day dedicated to it?

holidays.title: Kashmir Day
holidays.description: Observed by Pakistanis and Kashmiris who have been fighting for their freedom for over 70 years.

holidays.title: Leo Day
holidays.description: With notable people like Leonardo DiCaprio and Leo Da Vinci, the name Leo is something special.

holidays.title: Liberation Day San Marino
holidays.description: Today in history, San Marino was liberated from occupation by Cardinal Giulio Alberoni’s forces.

holidays.title: Move Hollywood & Broadway to Lebanon PA Day
holidays.description: Come join us as we determine if Hollywood and Broadway can be moved to Lebanon, P.A.

holidays.title: National Fart Day
holidays.description: On this special national holiday for farts, make sure you don’t hold back!

holidays.title: National Girls and Women in Sports Day
holidays.description: National Girls and Women in Sports Day, abbreviated as N.G.W.S.D., is observed on February 5 this year and it is all about breaking the gender…

holidays.title: National Pork Rind Day
holidays.description: Pork rinds are preferred by those who are trying to avoid chips and deep-fried snacks.

holidays.title: National Primrose Day
holidays.description: National Primrose Day falls on February 5 to honor the primrose flower and St. Agatha.

holidays.title: National Weatherman's Day
holidays.description: Join us to celebrate the ones who help us decide how to dress for the day!

holidays.title: Unity Day Burundi
holidays.description: Forget whether you are Tutsi or Hutu, and just be a Burundian for your country.

holidays.title: Western Monarch Day
holidays.description: Check out these (butter)fly ideas to celebrate and enjoy Western Monarch Day.

holidays.title: World Animal Reiki Day
holidays.description: Come and join us as we learn more about World Animal Reiki Day.

holidays.title: World Read Aloud Day
holidays.description: Practice your narrative skill by reading your favorite story aloud to your family, friends, and community.

holidays.title: Bobby Brown’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate Bobby who is multi-talented and possesses a variety of diverse abilities.

holidays.title: Cristiano Ronaldo’s Birthday
holidays.description: This Portuguese soccer legend has unmatched skills and is the world's top goal scorer.

holidays.title: Hank Aaron’s Birthday
holidays.description: This exceptional athlete who broke Babe Ruth's record had a long, illustrious career.

holidays.title: Kevin Gates’s Birthday
holidays.description: There is nothing in the world that will stop this multi-talented rapper!

holidays.title: Neymar’s Birthday
holidays.description: Celebrating Neymar, the soccer player with incredible confidence, fast reflexes, and an explosive pace!

holidays.title: Steven Suptic’s Birthday
holidays.description: This skilled and entertaining YouTube star is heading for success, and we can’t wait!
